Hi :smile: I got this ZBox attached behind TV, it only has ONE USB2 port which is used for wireless keyboard+mouse and rest all are USB3 ports (which does not boot any USB2/1 sticks) I got grub4dos IN + Windows and all but I can't [install](http://www.openelec.tv/get-openelec "External link") [OpenELEC](http://xbmc.org/natethomas/2011/10/26/openelec-1-0-released/ "External link") because it [requires USB](http://www.openelec.tv/installation/install-1-windows "External link") sticks! (to make things worse, there is no DVD/CD etc reader or writer)

There are [optimized builds for specific](http://www.openelec.tv/get-openelec "External link") platforms (mine is ION), so.... here is what i DID: 01. Modified batch file so it installs on X: (which is D:xbmc.img FiraDisk memdisk) 02. booted off from that xbmc.img (some syslinux started but never reached to [Installer part](http://www.openelec.tv/installation/install-2 "External link"))
Something tells me, this place can really solve this problem... ![:clap:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/clap.gif) EDIT: ![Posted Image](http://www.openelec.tv/images/stories/howto/createstick7.png) I have these files.... I think there is a way grub4dos can start the installer? and after installing possibly even boot IMG?

Is the volume label OPENELEC? The syslinux.cfg expects the volume label to be OPENELEC.
